title: Rito please fix this

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: So every game when i try to change the new reforged runes this appears,when i click the edit button,a border appears and i cannot change them more of my friends told that they have the same problem riot please fix soon! thanks

replies.body: Hmmmm that kinda looks like a bug tbh. I'd make sure to post this over in [**Report a Bug **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)where the devs can see!

Thanks man i am glad that someone sees that,riot community is getting better and better,day by day :) have a nice day Mr. BROPORO
anyway is happening in EUNE too cause i have both NA and EUNE accounts i just posted on that account cause i am lazy.

I'm willing to bet this kind of issue is probably going to hit other servers as well, but so far I've only heard from NA and EU regions personally. I'm still working with our tech support team to try and get to the bottom of this. Some things we've been exploring are possible permissions issues, so double check those following the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for me if you don't mind!
